articles.title: Here Are Warren Buffett's 5 Biggest Stock Holdings
articles.content: The article discusses Warren Buffett's long-term investing approach and recent moves by Berkshire Hathaway, including the sale of a significant portion of its Apple and Bank of America holdings. The article suggests that these adjustments do not necessarily indicate a loss of faith in the companies' long-term potential, but rather reflect Berkshire's strategic decision-making based on factors such as valuation and anticipated changes in capital gains taxes.

articles.title: Every Arm Holdings Investor Should Keep an Eye on This Number
articles.content: Arm Holdings, a semiconductor company, generates revenue through licensing its technology and collecting royalties. While license revenue can be volatile, royalty revenue provides a better indication of the company's performance and adoption of its new technologies.

articles.title: Jensen Huang Credits China's 'Amazing' Tech Ecosystem For Helping Shape AI Giant Nvidia
articles.content: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang highlighted the company's long-standing presence in China's technology ecosystem, emphasizing how the region has been instrumental in shaping the AI chip giant. Nvidia has seen unprecedented demand for its AI chips, with recent third-quarter revenue reaching $35.1 billion, up 94% year-over-year.

articles.title: Is The Trade Desk's New Streaming OS a Roku Killer?
articles.content: The Trade Desk has unveiled a new streaming operating system called Ventura, which aims to provide a more intuitive user experience and a cleaner ad supply chain in the streaming industry. This move puts The Trade Desk in direct competition with Roku, as well as big tech companies like Amazon and Apple.

articles.title: Meet the Spectacular Vanguard ETF With 45.1% of Its Portfolio Invested in Nvidia, Apple, Microsoft, and Amazon
articles.content: The Vanguard Mega Cap Growth ETF (MGK) has nearly half of its portfolio invested in four of America's largest tech stocks - Nvidia, Apple, Microsoft, and Amazon. The ETF consistently outperforms the S&P 500 and is a great option for investors looking to gain exposure to the top-performing AI-driven stocks.

articles.title: HP earnings in line with expectations, CEO says tariffs would hit the consumer
articles.content: HP CEO Enrique Lores weighs in on potential tariffs from the Trump administration.

articles.title: Dow Jones Futures: S&P 500 Hits Highs As Bitcoin Skids; CrowdStrike Leads Movers Late
articles.content: Amazon and megacaps helped the S&P 500 offset weak breadth and Trump tariffs. Bitcoin skidded again. CrowdStrike led key earnings late.

articles.title: Invesco American Franchise Fund Q3 2024 Commentary
articles.content: Invesco American Franchise Fund currently favors a balance of high quality companies with resilient growth and early cyclical companies with potential to benefit from lower interest rates.

articles.title: Market Chatter: Apple Faces Regulatory Hurdles to Launch In-House AI Models in China
articles.content: Apple (AAPL) is facing significant regulatory obstacles amid plans to bring its own artificial intelligence models to iPhones and other products in China, the Financial Times reported Tuesday, citing sources.

articles.title: Thankful Investors - Last 20 Years
articles.content: AI chipmaker Nvidia has easily been the best-performing stock over the last twenty years, and it has made a large number of investors extremely wealthy.
